title: Solar PV capacity - new installations worldwide by country 2018
summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Percentage of newly installed capacity in the y axis.
The Percentage of newly installed capacity is appeared to be the highest at Country China and lowest at Country Netherlands.
The highest Country China has 44.0 more Percentage of newly installed capacity than the lowest Country Netherlands.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Percentage of newly installed capacity in the y axis.
The Percentage of newly installed capacity is appeared to be the highest at Country China and lowest at Country Netherlands.
The second highest Percentage of newly installed capacity is appeared to be the Country US.
The difference of Percentage of newly installed capacity between the highest and lowest Country is 44.0.
The Country China has the highest Percentage of newly installed capacity, followed by US, and US. Down to the Country Netherlands which is the lowest.
Country India, and US have a similar Percentage of newly installed capacity that is 11.0.
The Country China tends to be 5.06 percent higher than average.
